name: Super Turbo Sudoku
description:
'Super Turbo Sudoku' is a classic Sudoku game with puzzles for beginners and pros.

Features:
  • 90 unique Sudokus
  • 6 Difficulties: From "Very Easy" to "Insane"
  • Sudoku Solver: Enter your own Sudoku and get the solution
  • Level Editor: Create your own Sudokus
  • 15 Achievements

Lay back, take your shoes off and enter the exiting world of "Super Turbo Sudoku"!
